<!-- parameter is given as obj-->

## data dimension

```{r, echo=FALSE }

paste0(obj$desc$nrow, " X ", obj$desc$ncol)

```



## missing Data

```{r, echo = FALSE}
paste0(obj$desc$missingCellCount, "(", obj$desc$missingCellRatio, "%)")
```

## data table

```{r, echo=FALSE}
EDAres <- data.frame(
      Name = obj$names,
      UniqueValues = obj$cards,
      Zero = obj$zeros,
      Missing = obj$miss,
      isUniform = obj$unif,
      isUnique = obj$uniq
    )

reactable::reactable(
        EDAres,
        bordered = TRUE,
        compact = TRUE,
        striped = TRUE
      )
```

## correlation

```{r, echo = FALSE}
GGally::ggcorr(obj$cors)
```
